channel.title: Header & Footer on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Header & Footer on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: FO - Check links in header
item.description: FO - Check links in header Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > Click on top left link “Contact us” Contact form page is well displayed Click on “Sign In” link on top right > Enter your email + password with the customer account created from the pre-condition step > Click on “Sign In” button * You are now logged in

item.title: FO - Check links in footer
item.description: FO - Check links in footer Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > Go to footer * See 4 blocks : ** Products ** Our company ** Your account ** Store Information * See also Copyright link at the bottom of the footer: “© XXXX - Ecommerce software by PrestaShop™ " link” Go to footer > Products block > click on all links * “Prices drop” link redirects to “Prices drop” category page

item.title: FO - Change language
item.description: FO - Change language Steps Step Description Expected result *Case 1: Disable french language Go to FO You will not see the link to change language in the header *Case 2: Enable french language Go to FO > Change language from EN to XX language from the list in the header The page changed to XX language The url has the /xx/ Switch back to EN FO is now in English

item.title: FO - Change currency
item.description: FO - Change currency Steps Step Description Expected result Case 1: You have one currency only The link to change currency will not appear in header of FO Case 2: You have 2 or more currencies Go to FO > Click on your current currency > Switch to another currency See that the price of your product is now in the new currency with the new exchange rate Switch back to your original currency The prices of products are now in the original currency with the original exchange rate
